original: <12328.23/2> yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
analyzed: yaḥ tam vetti sa mām vetti

original: yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu //12328.23/
analyzed: yaḥ nu tam sa hi mām anu
te ca eva an anya devatāḥ
tvam ca eva aham ca kaunteya
divam ca urvīm ca madhyam ca

original: <12328.53/4> ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti //12328.53/
analyzed: eka yoni tvāt ca parasparam mahayantaḥ lokān dhārayataḥ iti
saṃprakṣālana kāle tikrānte caturthe yuga sahasra ante
avyakte sarva bhūta pralaye sthāvara jaṅgame
jyotiḥ dharaṇi vāyu rahite ndhe tamasi jala ekārṇave loke
tamaḥ iti eva abhibhūte saṃjñake dvitīye pratiṣṭhite

original: <12329.3/5> naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite /
analyzed: na eva rātryām na divase na sati na asati na vyakte na avyakte vyavasthite

original: <12329.3/6> etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt
analyzed: etasyām avasthāyām nārāyaṇa guṇa āśrayāt akṣayāt ajarāt anindriyāt agrāhyāt asaṃbhavāt satyāt ahiṃsrāt lalāmāt vividha pravṛtti viśeṣāt

original: <12329.3/7> akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ //12329.3/
analyzed: akṣayāt ajara amarāt amūrtitaḥ sarva vyāpinaḥ sarva kartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ hariḥ avyayaḥ
na āsīt ahaḥ na rātriḥ āsīt
na sat āsīt na asat āsīt
tamaḥ eva purastāt abhavat viśva rūpam
sā viśvasya jananī iti evam asya arthaḥ nu bhāṣyate

original: <12329.5/1> tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja
analyzed: tasya idānīm tamaḥ saṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoneḥ brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇaḥ netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja

original: <12329.5/2> tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat /
analyzed: tatas bhūta sarge pravṛtte prajā krama vaśāt brahma kṣatram upātiṣṭhat

original: <12329.5/3> yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ somaḥ tat brahma yat brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ

original: <12329.5/4> yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram /
analyzed: yaḥ gniḥ tat kṣatram kṣatrāt brahma balavattaram

original: <12329.5/5> kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā /
analyzed: kasmāt iti loka pratyakṣa guṇam etat tat yathā
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ param bhūtam na utpanna pūrvam
dīpyamāne gnau juhoti iti kṛtvā bravīmi

original: <12329.5/8> bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryatae iti //12329.5/
analyzed: bhūta sargaḥ kṛtaḥ brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyam dhāryate iti

original: <12329.7/1> na hy ete mantrād dhavanam asti /
analyzed: na hi ete mantrāt dhavanam asti

original: <12329.7/3> havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ /
analyzed: haviḥ mantrāṇām saṃpūjā vidyate deva manuṣyāṇām anena tvam hotā iti niyuktaḥ

original: <12329.7/4> ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca /
analyzed: ye ca mānuṣāḥ hotrā adhikārāḥ te ca

original: <12329.7/5> brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya hi yājanam vidhīyate na kṣatra vaiśyayoḥ dvijātyoḥ

original: <12329.7/6> tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti /
analyzed: tasmāt brāhmaṇāḥ hi agni bhūtāḥ yajñān udvahanti

original: <12329.7/7> yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti //12329.7/
analyzed: yajñāḥ devān tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīm bhāvayanti

original: <12329.8/2> agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti /
analyzed: agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yaḥ vidvān brāhmaṇa mukhe dāna āhutim juhoti

original: <12329.8/3> evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti /
analyzed: evam api agni bhūtāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vidvāṃsaḥ gnim bhāvayanti

original: <12329.8/4> agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati /
analyzed: agniḥ viṣṇuḥ sarva bhūtāni anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati
api ca atra sanatkumāra gītāḥ ślokāḥ bhavanti
na eṣām ukṣā vardhate na uta vāhā

original: <12329.13/1> vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: veda purāṇa itihāsa prāmāṇyāt nārāyaṇa mukha udgatāḥ sarva ātmānaḥ sarva kartāraḥ sarva bhāvanāḥ ca brāhmaṇāḥ

original: <12329.13/2> vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
analyzed: vāc sama kālam hi tasya devasya vara pradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamam prādurbhūtāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ ca śeṣāḥ varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ

original: <12329.13/3> itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś  #
analyzed: ittham ca sura asura viśiṣṭāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ yadā mayā brahma bhūtena purā svayam eva utpāditāḥ sura asura mahā ṛṣayaḥ bhūta viśeṣāḥ sthāpitāḥ nigṛhītāḥ

original: <12329.14/1> ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ /
analyzed: ahalyā dharṣaṇa nimittam hi gautamāt hari śmaśru tām indraḥ prāptaḥ
kauśika nimittam ca indraḥ muṣka viyogam meṣa vṛṣaṇa tvam ca avāpa

original: <12329.14/3> aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ /
analyzed: aśvinoḥ graha pratiṣedha udyata vajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhitaḥ bāhuḥ

original: <12329.14/4> kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā //12329.14/
analyzed: kratu vadha prāpta manyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā ca ātmānam saṃyojya netra ākṛtiḥ anyā lalāṭe rudrasya utpāditā

original: <12329.15/1> tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ /
analyzed: tripura vadha artham dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasya uśanasā śirasaḥ jaṭāḥ utkṛtya prayuktāḥ

original: <12329.15/3> tair asya bhujagaiḥ_1 pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ /
analyzed: taiḥ asya bhujagaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ nīla tām upanītaḥ

original: <12329.15/4> pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā //12329.15/
analyzed: pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇa hasta bandha grahaṇāt nīlakaṇṭha tvam eva vā

original: <12329.16/1> amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ /
analyzed: amṛta utpādane puraścaraṇa tām upagatasya aṅgirasaḥ bṛhaspateḥ upaspṛśataḥ na prasādam gatavatyaḥ kila apaḥ

original: <12329.16/3> yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti
analyzed: yasmāt mama upaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtāḥ na prasādam upagatāḥ tasmāt adya prabhṛti jhaṣa makara matsya kacchapa jantu saṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavata iti
tadā prabhṛti āpaḥ yādobhiḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ

original: <12329.17/1> viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām /
analyzed: viśvarūpaḥ vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohitaḥ devānām āsīt svasrīyaḥ surāṇām

original: <12329.17/2> sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ //12329.17/
analyzed: sa pratyakṣam devebhyaḥ bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asurebhyaḥ

original: <12329.18/1> atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya_1 viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta /
analyzed: atha hiraṇyakaśipum puraskṛtya viśvarūpa mātaram svasāram asurāḥ varam ayācanta

original: <12329.18/2> he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam /
analyzed: he svasar ayam te putraḥ tvāṣṭraḥ viśvarūpaḥ triśirāḥ devānām purohitaḥ pratyakṣam devebhyaḥ bhāgam adadat paroakṣam asmākam

original: <12329.18/4> tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti //12329.18/
analyzed: tat enam tvam vārayitum arhasi tathā yathā asmān bhajet iti
atha viśvarūpam nandana vanam upagatam mātā uvāca

original: <12329.19/2> putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi /
analyzed: putra kim para pakṣa vardhanaḥ tvam mātula pakṣam nāśayasi

original: <12329.19/4> sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt //12329.19/
analyzed: sa viśvarūpaḥ mātuḥ vākyam an atikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt

original: <12329.20/1> hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān /
analyzed: hairaṇyagarbhāt ca vasiṣṭhāt hiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpam prāptavān

original: <12329.20/2> yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti /
analyzed: yasmāt tvayā anyaḥ vṛtaḥ hotā tasmāt a samāpta yajñaḥ tvam apūrvāt sattva jātāt vadham prāpsyasi iti
tad śāpa dānāt hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prāptavān vadham
viśvarūpaḥ mātṛ pakṣa vardhanaḥ u tyartham tapasi abhavat

original: <12329.21/2> tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja /
analyzed: tasya vrata bhaṅga artham indraḥ bahvīḥ śrīmatyaḥ psarasaḥ niyuyoja

original: <12329.21/3> tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat /
analyzed: tāḥ ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitam tasya abhavat tāsu ca apsaraḥsu nacirāt eva saktaḥ bhavat

original: <12329.21/4> saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti //12329.21/
analyzed: saktam ca enam jñātvā apsarasaḥ ūcuḥ gacchāmahe vayam yathāgatam iti

original: <12329.22/2> kva gamiṣyatha āsyatām tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: kva gamiṣyathaḥ āsyatām tāvat mayā saha śreyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: <12329.22/4> vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmahae iti //12329.22/
analyzed: vayam deva striyaḥ psarasaḥ indram vara dam purā prabhaviṣṇum vṛṇīmahae iti

original: <12329.23/1> atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti /
analyzed: atha tāḥ viśvarūpaḥ bravīt adya eva sa indrāḥ devāḥ na bhaviṣyanti iti

original: <12329.23/4> ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān /
analyzed: ekena āsyena sarva lokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhiḥ yajñeṣu su hutam somam papau ekena apaḥ ekena sa indrān devān

original: <12329.23/5> athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede //12329.23/
analyzed: athā indraḥ tam vivardhamānam soma pāna āpyāyita sarva gātram dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede

original: <12329.24/1> devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca /
analyzed: devāḥ ca te saha indreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmuḥ ūcuḥ ca
viśvarūpeṇa sarva yajñeṣu su hutaḥ somaḥ pīyate

original: <12329.24/5> tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti //12329.24/
analyzed: tat arhasi naḥ vidhātum śreyaḥ yat anantaram iti

original: <12329.25/1> tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ /
analyzed: tān brahmā uvāca ṛṣiḥ bhārgavaḥ tapaḥ tapyate dadhīcaḥ

original: <12329.25/2> sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt /
analyzed: sa yācyatām varam yathā kalevaram jahyāt

original: <12329.26/1> devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe /
analyzed: devāḥ tatra agacchan yatra dadhīcaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ tapaḥ tepe

original: <12329.26/2> sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti /
analyzed: sa indrāḥ devāḥ tam abhigamya ūcuḥ bhagavan tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnam ca iti

original: <12329.26/3> tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām /
analyzed: tān dadhīcaḥ uvāca svāgatam bhavadbhyaḥ kim kriyatām

original: <12329.26/5> te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti /
analyzed: te tam abruvam śarīra parityāgam loka hita artham bhagavān kartum arhati iti

original: <12329.26/501> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt /
<12329.26/502> X sahasraṃ varṣāṇām aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām /
analyzed: sahasram varṣāṇām aindram padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām

original: <12329.26/503> X tathety uktvendraḥ svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy- abhavat /
analyzed: tathā iti uktvā indraḥ sva sthānam dattvā tapasvī abhavat

original: <12329.26/505> X tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti /12329.26871/ X]
analyzed: tāvat pūrṇe sa indrāḥ devāḥ āgaman kālaḥ yam deha nyāsāya iti

original: <12329.26/6> atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra //12329.26/
analyzed: atha dadhīcaḥ tathā eva avimanāḥ sukha duḥkha samaḥ mahā yogī ātmānam samādhāya śarīra parityāgam cakāra

original: <12329.27/001> [X Kumbh..ed. ins:: śrutir apy atra bhavati /
<12329.27/002> X indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam iti /12329.26872/ X]
<12329.27/1> tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot /
analyzed: tasya paramātmani avasṛte tāni asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot

original: <12329.27/2> tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna /
analyzed: tena vajreṇa abhedyena apradhṛṣyeṇa brahma asthi saṃbhūtena viṣṇu praviṣṭena indraḥ viśvarūpam jaghāna

original: <12329.27/301> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. Cv:: takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā /12329.27873/ X]
analyzed: takṣan yajña paśoḥ śiraḥ te dadāmi iti uktvā

original: <12329.27/4> tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna //12329.27/
analyzed: tasmāt anantaram viśvarūpa gātra mathana saṃbhavam tvaṣṭrā utpāditam eva arim vṛtram indraḥ jaghāna

original: <12329.28/1> tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsusaṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ apsu /
analyzed: tasyām dvaidhībhūtāyām brahma vadhyāyām bhayāt indraḥ deva rājyam parityajya apsusaṃbhavām śītalām mānasa saraḥ gatām nalinīm apsu

original: <12329.28/2> tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa //12329.28/
analyzed: tatra ca aiśvarya yogāt aṇu mātraḥ bhūtvā bisa granthim praviveśa

original: <12329.29/1> atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva /
analyzed: atha brahma vadhyā bhaya pranaṣṭe trailokya nāthe śacīpatau jagat anīśvaram babhūva
an indrāḥ ca abalāḥ lokāḥ su pradhṛṣyāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: <12329.30/1> atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ /
analyzed: atha devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca āyuṣaḥ putram nahuṣam nāma deva rāja tve bhiṣiṣicuḥ

original: <12329.30/2> nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ jyotiṣām lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarva tejaḥ haraiḥ triviṣṭapam pālayām babhūva

original: <12329.30/3> atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ //12329.30/
analyzed: atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāḥ ca babhūvuḥ

original: <12329.31/2> sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti /
analyzed: sarvam mām śakra upabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti

original: <12329.31/3> sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām /
analyzed: saḥ evam uktvā śacī samīpam agamat uvāca ca enām

original: <12329.31/4> subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti /
analyzed: subhage ham indraḥ devānām bhajasva mām iti
prakṛtyā tvam dharma vatsalaḥ soma vaṃśa udbhavaḥ ca
na arhasi para patnī dharṣaṇam kartum iti

original: <12329.32/3> aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaścit tvam indrabhukteti /
analyzed: aham indrasya rājya ratna haraḥ na atra adharmaḥ kaścid tvam indra bhuktā iti

original: <12329.32/6> tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid evāhobhir iti /
analyzed: tasya avabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiścid eva ahobhiḥ iti
sa śacyā evam abhihitaḥ nahuṣaḥ jagāma

original: <12329.33/1> atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat /
analyzed: atha śacī duḥkha śoka ārtā bhartṛ darśana lālasā nahuṣa bhaya gṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat

original: <12329.33/2> sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca /
analyzed: sa ca tām abhigatām dṛṣṭvā eva dhyānam praviśya bhartṛ kārya tatparām jñātvā bṛhaspatiḥ uvāca

original: <12329.33/3> anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya /
analyzed: anena eva vratena tapasā ca anvitā devīm vara dām upaśrutim āhvaya

original: <12329.34/1> sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat /
analyzed: sā atha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīm vara dām upaśrutim mantraiḥ āhvayat

original: <12329.34/3> uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti /
analyzed: uvāca ca enām iyam asmi tvayā upahūtā upasthitā kim te priyam karavāṇi iti

original: <12329.34/4> tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti /
analyzed: tām mūrdhnā praṇamya uvāca śacī bhagavati arhasi me bhartāram darśayitum tvam satyā matā ca iti
tatra indram bisa granthi gatam adarśayat

original: <12329.35/1> tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: tām indraḥ patnīm kṛśām glānām ca dṛṣṭvā babhūva

original: <12329.35/2> aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam /
analyzed: aho mama mahat duḥkham idam adya upagatam

original: <12329.35/3> naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti /
analyzed: naṣṭam hi mām iyam anviṣya upāgamat duḥkha ārtā iti
tām indraḥ uvāca katham vartayasi iti
kālaḥ ca asya mayā kṛtaḥ iti

original: <12329.36/3> nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva /
analyzed: nahuṣaḥ tvayā vācyaḥ pūrveṇa mām ṛṣi yuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍhaḥ udvahasva

original: <12329.36/4> indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā /
analyzed: indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇi adhirūḍhāni mayā
indraḥ pi bisa granthim eva āviveśa bhūyas

original: <12329.37/1> athendrāṇim abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti /
analyzed: atha indrāṇim abhyāgatām dṛṣṭvā uvāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kālaḥ iti
tam śacī abravīt śakreṇa yathā uktam

original: <12329.37/3> sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat //12329.37/
analyzed: sa mahā ṛṣi yuktam vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacī samīpam upāgacchat

original: <12329.38/1> atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat /
analyzed: atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayoniḥ agastyaḥ mahā ṛṣīn vikriyamāṇān tān nahuṣeṇa apaśyat

original: <12329.38/3> tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm /
analyzed: tatas sa nahuṣam abravīt akārya pravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm

original: <12329.38/4> sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti /
analyzed: sarpaḥ bhava yāvat bhūmiḥ girayaḥ ca tiṣṭheyuḥ tāvat iti

original: <12329.38/5> sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat //12329.38/
analyzed: sa mahā ṛṣi vākya sama kālam eva tasmāt yānāt avāpatat
atha an indram punar trailokyam abhavat

original: <12329.39/2> tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ /
analyzed: tatas devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca bhagavantam viṣṇum śaraṇam indra arthe bhijagmuḥ

original: <12329.39/3> ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti /
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca enam bhagavan indram brahma vadhyā abhibhūtam trātum arhasi iti

original: <12329.39/4> tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu /
analyzed: tatas sa vara daḥ tān abravīt aśvamedham yajñam vaiṣṇavam śakraḥ bhiyajatu

original: <12329.40/1> tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti /
analyzed: tatas devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca indram na apaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcuḥ gaccha subhage indram ānayasva iti

original: <12329.40/3> indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma /
analyzed: indraḥ ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma
bṛhaspatiḥ ca aśvamedham mahā kratum śakrāya aharat

original: <12329.40/5> tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa //12329.40/
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇasāraṅgam medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanam tam eva kṛtvā indram marutpatim bṛhaspatiḥ sva sthānam prāpayām āsa

original: <12329.41/1> tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva /
analyzed: tatas sa devarāj devaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānaḥ triviṣṭapa sthaḥ niṣkalmaṣaḥ babhūva
brahma vadhyām caturṣu sthāneṣu vanitā agni vanaspati goṣu vyabhajat

original: <12329.41/201> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Cs.v ins:: vanitāsu rajaḥ /
<12329.41/206> X tasmād dhavir alavaṇaṃ pacyate /12329.41874/ X]
<12329.41/3> evaṃ indro brahmatejaḥprabhāvopabṛṃhitaḥ śatruvadhaṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ prāpitaḥ //12329.41/
analyzed: evam indraḥ brahma tejaḥ prabhāva upabṛṃhitaḥ śatru vadham kṛtvā sva sthānam prāpitaḥ

original: <12329.42/001> [X D7 T1 G1.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: nahuṣasya śāpamokṣanimittaṃ devair ṛṣibhir yācyamāno 'gastyaḥ prāha /
analyzed: nahuṣa śāpa mokṣa nimitta deva ṛṣi yāc gastya prāh

original: <12329.42/1> ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśagaṅgā gataḥ ca purā bharadvājaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ upāspṛśan trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunā abhyāsāditaḥ

original: <12329.42/2> sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ //12329.42/
analyzed: sa bharadvājena sa salilena pāṇinā urasi tāḍitaḥ sa lakṣaṇa uraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
bhṛguṇā mahā ṛṣiṇā śaptaḥ agniḥ sarva bhakṣa tvam upanītaḥ

original: <12329.44/1> aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti /
analyzed: aditiḥ vai devānām annam apacat etat bhuktvā asurān haniṣyanti iti
tatra budhaḥ vrata caryā samāptau āgacchat
aditim ca avocat bhikṣām dehi iti

original: <12329.44/4> tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt /
analyzed: tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyam na anyena iti aditiḥ bhikṣām na adāt

original: <12329.44/5> atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ /
analyzed: atha bhikṣā pratyākhyāna ruṣitena budhena brahma bhūtena vivasvataḥ dvitīye janmani aṇḍa saṃjñitasya aṇḍam māritam adityāḥ

original: <12329.44/501> [X K6.7 V1 Dn1.ṇ4 Ds D2-5.7-9 Cs Kumbh..ed. ins. after brahmabhūtena: :
aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā /12329.44876/ X]
analyzed: aditiḥ śaptā aditeḥ udare bhaviṣyati vyathā

original: <12329.45/2> tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave /
analyzed: tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādāt daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave

original: <12329.45/3> tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot /
analyzed: tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatra ākhyām gatāsu somaḥ rohiṇyām abhyadhikām prītim akarot

original: <12329.45/4> tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti /
analyzed: tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnyaḥ īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpam somaḥ rohiṇīm adhikam bhajati iti
saḥ bravīt yakṣmā enam āvekṣyati iti
dakṣa śāpāt somam rājānam yakṣmā āviveśa

original: <12329.46/3> dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasae iti /
analyzed: dakṣaḥ ca enam abravīt na samam vartase iti
tatra ṛṣayaḥ somam abruvan kṣīyase yakṣmaṇā
atha agacchat somaḥ tatra hiraṇyasaraḥ tīrtham
snātvā ca ātmānam pāpmanaḥ mokṣayām āsa

original: <12329.46/91> tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva (/)
analyzed: tatra ca avabhāsitaḥ tīrthe yadā somaḥ tadā prabhṛti tīrtham tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātam babhūva
tad śāpāt adya api kṣīyate somaḥ māvāsyā antara sthaḥ
paurṇamāsī mātre dhiṣṭhitaḥ megha lekhā praticchannam vapuḥ darśayati

original: <12329.46/94> meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat //12329.46/
analyzed: megha sadṛśam varṇam agamat tat asya śaśa lakṣma vimalam abhavat

original: <12329.47/1> sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe /
analyzed: sthūlaśirāḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapaḥ tepe

original: <12329.47/2> tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat /
analyzed: tasya tapaḥ tapyamānasya sarva gandha vahaḥ śuciḥ vāyuḥ vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat

original: <12329.47/3> sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat /
analyzed: sa tapasā tāpita śarīraḥ kṛśaḥ vāyunā upavījyamānaḥ hṛdaya paritoṣam agamat

original: <12329.47/4> tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto  #
analyzed: tatra tasya anila vyajana kṛta paritoṣasya sadyas vanaspatayaḥ puṣpa śobhām na darśitavantaḥ iti saḥ etām śaśāpa na sarvakālam

original: <12329.48/1> nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat /
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ loka hita artham vaḍavāmukhaḥ nāma mahā ṛṣiḥ purā bhavat

original: <12329.48/2> tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ /
analyzed: tasya merau tapaḥ tapyataḥ samudraḥ āhūtaḥ na āgataḥ
tena amarṣitena ātma gātra ūṣmaṇā samudraḥ stimita jalaḥ kṛtaḥ
sveda prasyandana sadṛśaḥ ca asya lavaṇa bhāvaḥ janitaḥ

original: <12329.48/6> etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: etat ca te toyam vaḍavāmukha saṃjñitena pīyamānam madhuram bhaviṣyati

original: <12329.48/7> tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate //12329.48/
analyzed: tat etat adyā api vaḍavāmukha saṃjñitena anuvartinā toyam sāmudram pīyate

original: <12329.49/001> [X D7 T G1-3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins:: punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva /12329.48877/ X]
analyzed: punar umā dakṣa kopa himavantaḥ gireḥ duhitrī babhūva

original: <12329.49/1> himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame /
analyzed: himavataḥ gireḥ duhitaram umām rudraḥ cakame

original: <12329.49/2> bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti /
analyzed: bhṛguḥ api ca mahā ṛṣiḥ himavantam āgamya abravīt kanyām umām me dehi iti

original: <12329.49/3> tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti /
analyzed: tam abravīt himavān abhilaṣitaḥ varaḥ rudraḥ iti

original: <12329.49/4> tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: tam abravīt bhṛguḥ yasmāt tvayā aham kanyā varaṇa kṛta bhāvaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ tasmāt na ratnānām bhavān bhājanam bhaviṣyati iti
adya prabhṛti etat avasthitam ṛṣi vacanam

original: <12329.50/2> kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje /
analyzed: kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayām pṛthivīm patnīm abhigamya bubhuje
yāskaḥ ṛṣiḥ udāra dhīḥ udāra dhīḥ
na hi jātaḥ na jāye haṃ
sat ca asat ca eva kaunteya

original: <12330.19/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 ins:: adho na kṣīyate yasmād /

analyzed: na anyaḥ hi adhoakṣa jaḥ loke

original: <12330.25/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca /
analyzed: na ādimat na ca antam ca

original: <12330.25/1> na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ /
analyzed: na ca ādim na madhyam tathā na eva ca antam
kadācid vidante surāḥ ca asurāḥ ca

original: <12330.25/3> anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ /
analyzed: anādyaḥ hi amadhyaḥ tathā ca api anantaḥ

original: <12330.50/003> X uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve gamyarūpeṇa tadā /12330.49881/ X]
analyzed: uccheṣaṇa bhāgaḥ vai rudraḥ tasya uccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve gamya rūpeṇa tadā
tvam ca eva krodha jaḥ tāta

original: <12330.64/1> yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti /
analyzed: yaḥ tvām vetti sa mām vetti

original: yas tvām anu sa mām anu /
analyzed: yaḥ tvām anu sa mām anu
yaḥ tu te saḥ gratas yāti
na tathā phala dam ca api
na ca asya kiṃcid a prāpyam

<12331.19/001> [X K1.2.4 V1 ins. after 18:: sūta uvāca:

<12332.22/001> [X D7 T G2.3.6 Kumbh..ed. ins. after 21,

original: <12334.14/3> ekāntināṃ śaraṇado 'bhayado gatido 'stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharas triguṇātigaḥ //12334.14/
analyzed: ekāntinām śaraṇa daḥ bhaya daḥ gati daḥ stu vaḥ sa makha bhāga haraḥ triguṇa atigaḥ
catuṣpañca dharaḥ pūrta iṣṭayoḥ ca phala bhāga haraḥ
gatim ātma gām su kṛtinām ṛṣiṇām
sa hi loka yoniḥ amṛtasya padam

original: <12335.8/001> [X K7 D4.9 ins:: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi /

analyzed: aṇḍa jam ca api me janma
priyaḥ ham te priyaḥ si me
kasya eṣa kaḥ nu khalu eṣa
ayam hi nityaḥ paramaḥ mahā ṛṣiḥ
na eva asya vindanti gatim mahātmanaḥ
na ca āgatim kaścid iha anupaśyati
a kartā ca eva kartā ca

original: <12336.62/001> [X T1 G3.6 ins:: tad eva kevalaṃ sthānaṃ /

analyzed: ime tathā jñāna mahā jala oghāḥ
yathā eva tvam tathā eva anye
jajñe bahu jñam param ati udāram

original: <12337.27/002> [X D7 T1 G3.6 cont:: tathākaroc ca dharmātmā /

analyzed: yaḥ ca api sūryam vyatiricya bhāti
tasya anvaye ca api tatas mahā ṛṣiḥ
pitā sa te veda nidhiḥ variṣṭhaḥ

original: <12337.48/6> tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ //12337.48/
analyzed: tasmāt ṛṣeḥ tvam bhavitā ca putraḥ
na anyaḥ asti iti ca vādinaḥ

original: <12337.68/1> sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve /
analyzed: sāṃkhyam ca yogam ca sanātane dve
tasmāt ṛṣeḥ tat bhavati iti vidyāt
divi antarikṣe bhuvi ca apsu ca api
tasya eka tvam mahā tvam hi
mahā udadhiḥ ca ambhasām yoniḥ ekaḥ
puruṣaḥ ca ekaḥ nirguṇaḥ viśva rūpaḥ
jñātā jñeyam sa guṇam nirguṇam ca
yat vai proktam guṇa sāmyam pradhānam
nityam ca etat śāśvatam ca avyayam ca

original: <12339.18/1> yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ /
analyzed: yat vai sūte dhātuḥ ādyam nidhānam

original: <12339.18/3> yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu /
analyzed: yat vai loke vaidikam karma sādhu
āśīḥ yuktam tat hi tasya upabhojyam

original: <12339.19/4> tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt jātaḥ tvam ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ
sarve vedāḥ sa rahasyāḥ hi putra
